# MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.none

**Case**

No language option change is to be made.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.nowPlayingItemOnly**: The language option change is applied to the now playing item only.
- **MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.permanent**: The language option change is applied to all future playback items.

items.description: The language option change is applied to the now playing item only.
items.name: MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.nowPlayingItemOnly

items.description: The language option change is applied to all future playback items.
